Name: Minotaur
Equipment_Options: Models in this Formation are equipped with Twin Heavy Battle Axes.

Unit_Abilities.Ability_Effect: When this Formation completes a charge select an enemy Formation within 1” and roll 5D6 for each model in this Formation. For each result of 5+ the selected Formation suffers 1 Ethereal Damage.
While an enemy Formation is within 1” of this Formation then that Formation may only resolve attacks against this Formation. In addition, enemy Formations cannot disengage from this Formation.
